1.desc: During the Merging period, Gear Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
During the Merging period, Peak Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
During the Merging period, Deity Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!

Drops from taking part in the mode during the event period|C:0xfef124&T:[Warrior Token] |
Gather enough |C:0xfef124&T:Warrior Tokens| to exchange for rare rewards in |C:0x00ff00&T:[Merging Exchange] |

During the event, participate in each gameplay to gain |C:0xfef124&T:【Glow Stick】|,|C:0xfef124&T:【Ballon】|
|C:0xfef124&T:【Glow Stick】and【Ballon】| can be used in |C:0x13ee22&T:【Faction Competition】| event
During the Treasure Hunt event, Gear Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
During the Treasure Hunt event, Peak Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
During the Treasure Hunt event, Deity Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
During the Treasure Hunt event, Soulgear Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
During the Treasure Hunt event, Rune Hunt's prize gaining chance |C:0xfef124&T:X5|, don't miss out on this great opportunity!

During the event, |C:0xfef124&T:[Silver Hammer Shard]| and |C:0xfef124&T:[Holy Shield]| can be obtained from gameplays|
|C:0xfef124&T:Silver Hammer Shard| can be used to merge Silver Hammer, which can be used in |C:0x13ee22&T:[Egg Smash]| to gain top rewards
|C:0xfef124&T:Holy Shield| can be used to get draw ample rewards in |C:0x13ee22&T:[Treasure Hunt]|

During the event, participate in each gameplay to gain |C:0xfef124&T:【Glow Stick】|,|C:0xfef124&T:【Ballon】|

|C:0xfef124&T:[Green Riceball]| can be used in the |C:0x13ee22&T:[Qingming Banquet]| event to get Banquet
|C:0xfef124&T:[Kite]| can be used in the |C:0x13ee22&T:[Exchange]| to get rare rewards
